entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 28, 19:00 - 20:00 UTC

Dec 16, 11:18 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/12/2022 19:00 UTC
End time : 28/12/2022 20:00 UTC
Service Impact : Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner will perform maintenance in the GRA7 region to release the latest underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

entry.title: [P19][MX Plan] - Infrastructure migration
entry.content:
Dec 20, 17:03 UTC
Completed - Everything has been migrated.
The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Dec 16, 14:35 UTC
Update - 50% of customers and webmails have been migrated to the new infrastructure. To continue this migration in the best conditions, we will do the rest on Monday 19/12/2022 and Tuesday 20/12/2022.
Here is the new end time:
End time : 20/12/2022 16:00 UTC

Dec 14, 21:42 UTC
Update - The intervention on webmail has been done with success.

Dec 14, 13:55 UTC
Update - Delivery of webmail is fully switchover to new infrastructure, to finalize operation on webmail, we will stop webmail during 30min between 22h00 and 22h30 FR time.
For rest of infrastructure allowing the sending of mails, switchover is still in progress

Dec 13, 08:13 UTC
Update - Switchover is still in progress and we will apply it on webmail from today 13/12/2022.

Dec 12, 09:32 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 12, 09:16 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/12/2022 09:30 UTC
End time : 16/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to improve the availability of the infrastructure allowing the sending of mails, a progressive switchover of infrastructure will take place from 12/12/22 to 16/12/22.
The webmail will not change for the moment.
